# PRESCRIPTO üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏èüè•ü§í
</div>

<div>
  <p>
    This full-stack appointment booking system is designed for doctors ü©∫ and hospitals üè•. It includes a robust three-level authentication system:
  </p>

  <ol>
    <li>
      <strong>üë§ Patient Login:</strong> Patients can register or log in to book appointments üìÖ with doctors and manage their scheduled visits üóìÔ∏è.
    </li>
    <li>
      <strong>üßë‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Doctor Login:</strong> Doctors can log in to view appointments üìã and earnings üí∞. They can also update their profiles via the dashboard üßæ.
    </li>
    <li>
      <strong>üõ†Ô∏è Admin Dashboard:</strong> Admins can manage all appointments ‚úÖ and doctor profiles üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è through a dedicated admin panel üìä.
    </li>
  </ol>
</div>
